# indiacensus

An R package for accessing digitised Census of India data from 1901 to
2011.

## Installation

``` r
devtools::install_github("saketc/indiacensus")
```

## Quickstart

``` r
library(indiacensus)

# Get state-level population for 2011
get_census(2011, "state")

# Get district population for Maharashtra in 1971
get_census(1971, "district", state = "Maharashtra")

# Get data with geographic boundaries for mapping
get_census(1971, "district", state = "MH", geometry = TRUE)

# Browse available variables
list_census_variables()

# Search for specific variables
search_census_variables("literacy")

# See what data is available for each year
list_census_geographies()
```

## Examples

``` r
# State populations over time (1901-2011)
pop <- get_census(2011, "state")

library(ggplot2)

# Get 1971 district data for Maharashtra with boundaries
mh <- get_census(1971, "district", state = "Maharashtra", geometry = TRUE)

# Create a choropleth map
ggplot(mh) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = population)) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Population by District - Maharashtra 1971")

# What years and geographies are available?
list_census_geographies()

# What variables exist?
list_census_variables()

# Variables available for 1981
list_census_variables(year = 1981)

# Find worker-related variables
search_census_variables("worker")
```

## Vignettes

- [Population
  Growth](https://saketkc.github.io/indiacensus/articles/population-maps.html)
- [ST Population
  Distribution](https://saketkc.github.io/indiacensus/articles/st-population.html)
- [Linguistic
  Diversity](https://saketkc.github.io/indiacensus/articles/linguistic-diversity.html)

## Data Source

Most datasets in this package are derived from:

> Jolad, Shivakumar and Singh, Madhav (2026). “Indian Census Data
> Collection, 1901-2026: Digitised Subnational Population and
> Administrative Datasets.” Harvard Dataverse.
> <https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/ON8CP8>

The 2011 mother tongue data is derived from the census of india official
website.

## License

MIT

# Package index

## Census Datasets

Pre-loaded census data

- [`census_1961_literacy`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/census_1961_literacy.md)
  : Census 1961 literacy data
- [`census_1971`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/census_1971.md)
  : Census 1971 Primary Census Abstract
- [`census_1981`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/census_1981.md)
  : Census 1981 Primary Census Abstract
- [`census_2011_pca`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/census_2011_pca.md)
  : Census 2011 Primary Census Abstract (PCA)
- [`census_2011_mother_tongue`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/census_2011_mother_tongue.md)
  : Census 2011 Mother Tongue Data (C-16)
- [`census_population_time_series`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/census_population_time_series.md)
  : Census population time series (1901-2011)
- [`census_subdistricts_2011`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/census_subdistricts_2011.md)
  : Subdistrict Directory with 2011 Census Data
- [`census_variables`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/census_variables.md)
  : Census Variables Lookup
- [`india_states`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/india_states.md)
  : Indian States Lookup

## Census Data Access

Retrieve census datasets programmatically

- [`get_census()`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/get_census.md)
  : Get India Census Data

## Geographic Boundaries

Work with administrative boundaries

- [`get_census_boundaries()`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/get_census_boundaries.md)
  : Get census boundaries
- [`attach_geometry()`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/attach_geometry.md)
  : Attach geographic boundaries to census data
- [`clear_geometry_cache()`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/clear_geometry_cache.md)
  : Clear geometry cache

## Mapping & Visualization

Create choropleth maps

- [`plotting`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/plotting.md)
  : Plotting functions for census data
- [`plot_map()`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/plot_map.md)
  : Creates a choropleth map from census data with sensible defaults.
- [`compare_maps()`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/compare_maps.md)
  : Compare maps across years
- [`get_palette()`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/get_palette.md)
  : Get color palette

## Variable Discovery

Explore available census variables

- [`list_census_variables()`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/list_census_variables.md)
  : List census variables
- [`list_census_geographies()`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/list_census_geographies.md)
  : List Available Census Geographies
- [`list_states()`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/list_states.md)
  : List Indian states
- [`search_census_variables()`](https://saketlab.github.io/indiacensus/reference/search_census_variables.md)
  : Search census variables
